snippet.title: Wattam Sneak Peek
snippet.description:
A first look at our second game: Wattam, which will be playable at E3 2015. For more, follow us at:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/funomena
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/funomenagames
Web: http://www.funomena.com

Inspired by playing make-believe with Keita's two-year-old son,  Wattam is a colorful, joyful world in which everyday things come to life. Stack, chain and explode big groups of Wattam's people to unlock more friends. Then, use their unique abilities to discover new landscapes, behaviors and music as you explore their many combinations.

Sound like fun? Come visit us at the IndieCade booth this E3 to experience it for yourself :D
